Label: Respondent sequence number
Target: Both males and females 1 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have serious difficulty hearing?
Comment: With this next set of questions, we want to learn about people who have physical, mental, or emotional conditions that cause serious difficulties with their daily activities. Though different, these questions may sound similar to ones I asked earlier. {Are you/Is SP} deaf or {do you/does he/does she} have serious difficulty hearing?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY 'YOU' AND 'DO YOU'. IF SP AGE <16, DISPLAY 'SP' AND 'DOES HE/DOES SHE'.
Target: Both males and females 1 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have serious difficulty seeing?
Comment: {Are you/Is SP} blind or {do you/does he/does she} have serious difficulty seeing even when wearing glasses?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY 'YOU' AND 'DO YOU'. IF SP AGE <16, DISPLAY 'SP' AND 'DOES HE/DOES SHE'.
Target: Both males and females 1 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have serious difficulty concentrating ?
Comment: Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, {do you/does he/does she} have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY  'DO YOU'. IF SP AGE <16, DISPLAY 'DOES HE/DOES SHE'.
Target: Both males and females 5 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have serious difficulty walking ?
Comment: {Do you/Does SP} have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY  'DO YOU'. IF SP AGE <16, DISPLAY  'DOES SP'.
Target: Both males and females 5 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have difficulty dressing or bathing?
Comment: {Do you/Does SP} have difficulty dressing or bathing?
Target: Both males and females 5 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Have difficulty doing errands alone ?
Comment: Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, {do you/does he/does she} have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a doctor's office or shopping?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP AGE >= 16, DISPLAY 'DO YOU'. IF SP AGE <16, DISPLAY  'DOES HE/DOES SHE'.
Target: Both males and females 15 YEARS - 150 YEARS
